bibl.title: Nag Hammadi Codices III, 3-4 and V, 1, with Papyrus Berolinensis 8502, 3 and Oxyrhynchus Papyrus 1081: Eugnostos and The Sophia of Jesus Christ. (The Coptic Gnostic Library. Nag Hammadi Studies. XXVII.)
bibl.note: Voir pp. 209-216: P. Oxy. VIII, 1081 (= van Haelst 1064), Sophia Jesu Christi. Nouvelle édition, traduction et notes.
bibl.seg: PARROTT Douglas M., Nag Hammadi Codices III, 3-4 and V, 1, with Papyrus Berolinensis 8502, 3 and Oxyrhynchus Papyrus 1081: Eugnostos and The Sophia of Jesus Christ. (The Coptic Gnostic Library. Nag Hammadi Studies. XXVII.)
Leiden, E.J. Brill, 1991, 8°, xxiii-216 pp. ISBN 90-04-08366-9. Hfl. 145/$83.
